steps.9: Slide floss under the tortilla, perpendicular to the length of the roll. Place the floss halfway between two toothpicks.
steps.10: Cross the two ends of the floss over the top of the tortilla roll. Holding one end of the floss in each hand, pull the floss ends in opposite directions to slice.
steps.11: Continue slicing with floss to create 5 pinwheels.

steps.1: Measure 12 ounces of cold water and transfer to a kettle.
steps.2: Assemble the filter cone. Place the dripper on top of a coffee mug.
steps.3: Prepare the filter insert by folding the paper filter in half to create a semi-circle, and in half again to create a quarter-circle. Place the paper filter in the dripper and spread open to create a cone.
steps.4: Weigh the coffee beans and grind until the coffee grounds are the consistency of coarse sand, about 20 seconds. Transfer the grounds to the filter cone.
steps.5: Check the temperature of the water.
steps.6: Pour a small amount of water in the filter to wet the grounds. Wait about 30 seconds.
steps.7: Slowly pour the rest of the water over the grounds in a circular motion. Do not overfill beyond the top of the paper filter.
steps.8: Let the coffee drain completely into the mug before removing the dripper. Discard the paper filter and coffee grounds.
